vlive.korean: 여러분들한테 저의 얼굴을 보여주고 싶은데 너무 그렇다, 그렇지? I want to show them my face but I don't look that good, do I? 듣기 View video NCT : 해벌
vlive.english: I want to show them my face but I don't look that good, do I?

vlive.korean: 그렇다보니까 이제 점점 무심한 성격으로 변했달까요? Having that, the personality changed to being indifferent? 듣기 View video ITZY : 류진이의 왓어원더풀나잇💙
vlive.english: Having that, the personality changed to being indifferent?

vlive.korean: 그거 보기 좀 그렇다 그러려고 했는데... I was just trying to compliment you about... 듣기 View video GOT7 : 마크도 왔어요 진영 재범도

vlive.korean: 나랑 싸운 건 그렇다 쳐 너랑은 또 왜 그러는 거야? I had a fight with her. Then, what's going on between you two? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 충격) 절친이 내 남친이랑 바람났다 [다만너] - EP.03
vlive.english: I had a fight with her. Then, what's going on between you two?

vlive.korean: 잠시만, 단둘이 얘기하니까 조금 그렇다 - 그렇죠? Hang on. It's a bit weird when just two of us talk together. - Right? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 해피댕댕데이🐶🎂🎉
vlive.english: Hang on. It's a bit weird when just two of us talk together. - Right?
